# tf.losses.get_regularization_loss

``` python
tf.losses.get_regularization_loss(
    scope=None,
    name='total_regularization_loss'
)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/ops/losses/util.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.9/tensorflow/python/ops/losses/util.py).

Gets the total regularization loss.

#### Args:

* <b>`scope`</b>: An optional scope name for filtering the losses to return.
* <b>`name`</b>: The name of the returned tensor.


#### Returns:

A scalar regularization loss.
